TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuCommandService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class MenuCommandService Implements IDisposable, IMenuCommandService
type MenuCommandService = class interface IMenuCommandService interface IDisposable

summary.span: 实现 接口。

span.span: Implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现接口, 该接口是用于为菜单命令添加处理程序并定义谓词的托管接口。The class implements the interface, which is the managed interface used to add handlers for menu commands and to define verbs. 包类自动提供`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` 类,以便为整个包提供全局命令,该类还提供此类以提供当前窗口的命令。The class is automatically offered by the package class to offer global commands for an entire package, and it is also offered by the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` class to offer commands for the current window. 此产品始终通过服务容器来完成, 因此从包或窗口窗格类派生的任何人都可以删除或替换接口的默认实现。This offering is always done through the service container, so anyone deriving from the package or window pane classes can remove or replace the default implementation of the interface. 类使用多种其他服务。The class utilizes several other services. 所有这些服务都是可选的, 因此, 如果缺少一个或多个服务, 则类的行为会降低。All of these services are optional, so the behavior of the class degrades if one or more services are missing. 下表显示了使用的服务和用途。The following table shows which services are used and for what purpose. |服务Service|目标Purpose| |-------------|-------------| ||用于发现当前选择项, 以便获取当前选定设计器提供的谓词。Used to discover the current selection in order to obtain verbs offered by the currently selected designer.| ||用于获取当前选定组件的设计器 (如果有)。Used to obtain the designer for the currently selected component, if any.| |`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsUIShell`|用于通知 Visual Studio 命令状态已更改。Used to notify Visual Studio that the command status has changed.| |`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IOleComponentUIManager`|用于显示上下文菜单。Used to show context menus.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果服务正在用于设计器, 则该`serviceProvider`参数应为设计器的服务提供程序, 就像使用的情况一样。If the service is being used with a designer, the `serviceProvider` parameter should be the service provider for the designer, as is the case with .

span.span: The to add.

summary.span: 将命令处理程序添加到菜单命令服务。

span.span: Adds a command handler to the menu command service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将命令处理程序添加到菜单命令服务。The method adds a command handler to the menu command service. 命令处理程序不会定义菜单项的文本、快捷方式或位置。Command handlers do not define the text, shortcut, or placement of a menu item. 如果单击该项, 它们将定义菜单项的行为。Rather, they define the menu item's behavior if the item is clicked.

span.span: is .
A command handler already exists.

span.span: The to add.

summary.span: 将谓词添加到 的谓词表中。

span.span: Adds a verb to the verb table of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无论当前选择哪个设计器, 此谓词都可用。This verb is available regardless of what designer is currently selected. 与菜单命令不同, 谓词可以定义向用户显示的文本, 但不会在实际菜单上定义该命令的位置。Unlike menu commands, verbs can define the text that is displayed to the user, but they do not define the placement of the command on the actual menu.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当参数为 true 时, 此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。 `disposing`When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时, 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息, 请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

returns.span: 如果找到了命令，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the command was found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先在本地表单中搜索给定的命令 ID。The local form is first searched for the given command ID. 如果找到, 则调用它。If it is found, it is invoked. 否则, 命令 ID 会传递到全局环境命令处理程序 (如果有)。Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先在本地表单中搜索给定的命令 ID。The local form is first searched for the given command ID. 如果找到, 则调用它。If it is found, it is invoked. 否则, 命令 ID 会传递到全局环境命令处理程序 (如果有)。Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuCommandsChanged As MenuCommandsChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 当菜单命令的状态更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the status of a menu command has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCommandsChanged(class System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCommandsChanged (e As MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)

abstract member OnCommandsChanged : System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs -> unit override this.OnCommandsChanged : System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当该方法的状态发生更改时, 该方法由菜单命令调用。The method is called by a menu command when its status has changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取当前可用的设计器谓词的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.

value.span: 当前可用的设计器谓词的 。

span.span: A of the designer verbs that are currently available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供谓词的集合。The property provides a collection of verbs. 这些谓词来自以下两个位置:These verbs come from two places: - 通过的方法添加的谓词。Verbs added through the method of . - 当前选定设计器提供的谓词。Verbs offered by the currently selected designer. 通过方法添加到此服务的谓词称为全局谓词, 因为它们在此服务中是全局性的, 但对于每个工具或文档窗口, 此服务通常有一个实例。Verbs added to this service through the method are called global verbs because they are global to this service, but generally there is one instance of this service for each tool or document window. 设计器谓词是通过查询和的服务提供程序获取的。Designer verbs are obtained by querying the service provider for and . 如果选择服务提供了主选项, 并且可以从该选择获取设计器, 则会将设计器的谓词添加到此列表中。If the selection service offers a primary selection, and a designer can be obtained for that selection from , the designer's verbs are added to this list. 如果全局谓词的名称与设计器谓词的名称冲突, 则设计器提供的设计器谓词优先。If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
